column5: It was a sad day at work yesterday,when we found out that two of our union brothers were in a major accident.The driver did not make it .but the passenger is in serious condition at sunnybrook. My condolences to the drivers family and friends and my prayers for the passenger.

My prayers and condolences to the families and friends. Someone I knew, a father of two young children has recently passed away in a tragic accident involving a steel coil that broke away and crushed the cab of his truck with him in it.A horifying picture when I received it.The worst was, it was around xmass time.
Very sad indeed, I saw that on the T.O. news last night.  Appeared as if he possibly had too much speed for the ramp
That is awful. Condolences to the family.
Lew all we know so far is that they are still investigating  ! I felt sick all day just thinking about it.I drove that truck about a month ago !
Best of luck to the family and friends involved.
Followed it on the news just after it happened, hoping he was going to make it out safe.  condolences to all.
